full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Notice - Air Refrigeration System and Enclosure**

**Reference:** WS4277031310-Doc4320468032

**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023

**Closing Date:** March 7, 2024, 14:00 hours EST

**Amendment Date:** February 29, 2024

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the Design-Build of a Refrigeration System and its Enclosure, including a complete Air Supply System, for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC).

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** The highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Key Deliverables**

* Design, build, install, and commission a refrigeration system and its enclosure, including the air supply system
* Provide a comprehensive maintenance plan and operational training in accordance with the Statement of Work

**Procurement Documents**

Bidders are required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing date and time specified above. Bids received after this time will be declared non-compliant.

**Contracting Entity**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**

* For all inquiries, please contact Gregoire Morin, PSPC, at (613) [insert phone number] or gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL**

* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18081365?extsite=MTgwODEzNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. The deadline for bid submission is March 7, 2024, at 14:00 hours EST. Note that bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive. More information is available in the procurement documents.
